segment.source: URL Shortener #
segment.target: URL Shortener #

segment.source: Author: Noelia Ruiz Martínez
segment.target: Author: Noelia Ruiz Martínez

segment.source: This add-on is used to shorten URLs from NVDA through [is.gd][1].
segment.target: This add-on is used to shorten URLs from NVDA through [is.gd][1].

segment.source: Shorten URL dialog ##
segment.target: Shorten URL dialog ##

segment.source: Go to NVDA's menu, Tools submenu, and activate the Shorten URL item.
segment.target: Go to NVDA's menu, Tools submenu, and activate the Shorten URL item.

segment.source: Alternatively, you can assign a gesture from the Input gestures dialog of NVDA.
segment.target: Alternatively, you can assign a gesture from the Input gestures dialog of NVDA.

segment.source: The Shorten URL dialog includes the following controls:
segment.target: The Shorten URL dialog includes the following controls:

segment.source: A list to select one of the saved URLs. From this list, Press shift+tab to search, and tab to press one of the following buttons.
segment.target: A list to select one of the saved URLs. From this list, Press shift+tab to search, and tab to press one of the following buttons.

segment.source: Copy shortened URL. This can also be activated by pressing Enter from the URLs list.
segment.target: Copy shortened URL. This can also be activated by pressing Enter from the URLs list.

segment.source: A readonly box showing details about the selected URL.
segment.target: A readonly box showing details about the selected URL.

segment.source: Set of controls to shorten a new URL: Provide the new URL; optionally, you can set a display name and a custom subfix for the shortened URL. Finally, press the Shorten URL button.
segment.target: Set of controls to shorten a new URL: Provide the new URL; optionally, you can set a display name and a custom subfix for the shortened URL. Finally, press the Shorten URL button.

segment.source: Rename: opens a dialog to provide a new name to display the selected URL on the list.
segment.target: Rename: opens a dialog to provide a new name to display the selected URL on the list.

segment.source: Delete: opens a dialog to delete the selected URL.
segment.target: Delete: opens a dialog to delete the selected URL.

segment.source: Remove saved URLs: opens a dialog to remove the saved URLs from the configuration folder.
segment.target: Remove saved URLs: opens a dialog to remove the saved URLs from the configuration folder.

segment.source: Close.
segment.target: Close.

segment.source: Changes for 8.0.0 ##
segment.target: Changes for 8.0.0 ##

segment.source: Added a readonly box with details about the selected URL.
segment.target: Added a readonly box with details about the selected URL.

segment.source: Changes for 5.0.0 ##
segment.target: Changes for 5.0.0 ##

segment.source: The new URL dialog has been replaced with a set of controls in the main dialog, so that the focus can be placed in the relevant field to fix possible errors.
segment.target: The new URL dialog has been replaced with a set of controls in the main dialog, so that the focus can be placed in the relevant field to fix possible errors.

segment.source: Changes for 2.0.0 ##
segment.target: Changes for 2.0.0 ##

segment.source: The Shorten URL option won't appear multiple times in Tools submenu when reloading plugins.
segment.target: The Shorten URL option won't appear multiple times in Tools submenu when reloading plugins.

segment.source: The New URL dialog includes an edit box to provide a custom subfix for the shortened URL.
segment.target: The New URL dialog includes an edit box to provide a custom subfix for the shortened URL.

segment.source: Changes for 1.0.0 ##
segment.target: Changes for 1.0.0 ##

segment.source: Initial version.
segment.target: Initial version.

segment.source: [1]: https://is.gd
segment.target: [1]: https://is.gd
